thread.title: Trailer for teen slasher movie '#Horror' unveiled
thread.title_full: Trailer for teen slasher movie '#Horror' unveiled - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Trailer for teen slasher movie '#Horror' unveiled
text:
The terrifying trailer for '#Horror' is the most brutal revenge possible for cyber-bullying.
Producer Tara Subkoff's ('The Killer Inside Me') directorial debut examines the harsh consequences of social media addiction taken to the extreme, reported Digital Spy.
Purportedly inspired by true events, a group of pre-teen girls face a night of sadistic thrills and sadism as revenge for taunting a classmate.
Subkoff has put together an impressive cast of adults as well with Chloe Sevigny, Orange Is the New Black star Taryn Manning and Natasha Lyonne, Oscar winner Timothy Hutton and Twin Peaks star Balthazar Getty all in supporting roles.
Aside from directing #Horror , Subkoff also penned the screenplay and is producing the project.
#Horror releases on November 20 in US cinemas.
 #Horror Official Trailer #1 (2015) - Taryn Manning, Natasha Lyonne Movie HD
